parameters.description: Intrinsic regrowth rate of Acropora cover (fast-growing coral)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Intrinsic annual regrowth rate of fast-growing Acropora coral

parameters.description: Intrinsic regrowth rate of massive corals (Faviidae/Porites)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Intrinsic annual regrowth rate of slow-growing massive corals

parameters.description: Background (non-predation, non-bleaching) mortality rate for Acropora
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Annual background mortality rate of Acropora excluding predation and bleaching

parameters.description: Background mortality rate for massive corals
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Annual background mortality rate of massive corals excluding predation and bleaching

parameters.description: Bleaching mortality sensitivity for Acropora (multiplies thermal stress factor)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Bleaching-induced mortality sensitivity multiplier for Acropora coral

parameters.description: Bleaching mortality sensitivity for massive corals (lower than Acropora)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Bleaching-induced mortality sensitivity multiplier for massive corals

parameters.description: Soft threshold SST for onset of bleaching mortality
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Sea surface temperature threshold for onset of coral bleaching stress (°C)

parameters.description: Softness parameter of bleaching threshold (larger values imply a sharper transition)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls smoothness of thermal bleaching onset; higher values approximate a harder threshold

parameters.description: Attack/consumption rate on Acropora by COTS (preference-weighted)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Per-capita annual proportional loss of Acropora due to COTS predation

parameters.description: Attack/consumption rate on massive corals by COTS
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Per-capita annual proportional loss of massive corals due to COTS predation (lower than Acropora)

parameters.description: Half-saturation density for Type-III predation intensity
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: COTS density at which predation intensity reaches half of its maximum (Type-III response)

parameters.description: COTS intrinsic growth rate (fecundity to adult recruitment potential)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Baseline annual per-capita growth potential of adult COTS before limitations and mortality

parameters.description: Baseline annual mortality rate of adult COTS
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Background adult mortality not attributable to starvation or other modeled processes

parameters.description: Mortality multiplier when food is scarce (scales starvation component)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Strength of additional mortality as food availability declines from 1 to 0

parameters.description: Baseline COTS carrying capacity scaling factor
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Maximum adult COTS density when food availability saturates (scaled by food availability)

parameters.description: Weight of Acropora in COTS food availability/carrying capacity
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Relative contribution of Acropora cover to COTS food saturation and carrying capacity

parameters.description: Weight of massive corals in COTS food availability/carrying capacity
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Relative contribution of slow-growing massive coral cover to COTS food saturation and carrying capacity

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for food-driven recruitment/capacity
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Food availability at which resource-driven processes reach half their maximum effect (0–1 scale)

parameters.description: Optimal temperature for COTS reproduction (thermal performance peak)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Temperature at which COTS reproductive processes perform best (°C)

parameters.description: Breadth (standard deviation) of the thermal performance curve for COTS reproduction
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls how quickly reproductive performance declines away from the thermal optimum (°C)

parameters.description: Allee effect parameter for COTS (low-density limitation)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Characteristic density that smooths low-density limitation in COTS intrinsic growth

parameters.description: Conversion from Acropora consumption to COTS recruitment
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Strength linking Acropora predation losses to COTS recruit production (per year per m^2)

parameters.description: Conversion from massive coral consumption to COTS recruitment
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Strength linking massive coral predation losses to COTS recruit production (per year per m^2)

parameters.description: Fraction of larval immigration that survives to adult class per year
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Annual survival proportion from incoming larvae to observed adult COTS density

parameters.description: Maximum combined cover of modeled coral groups
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Carrying capacity of benthic space available to the modeled coral groups (0–1 scale)

parameters.description: Observation error (SD) for COTS on log scale
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-transformed observation model for adult COTS density

parameters.description: Observation error (SD) for Acropora cover in percentage points
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of observation model for Acropora percent cover

parameters.description: Observation error (SD) for massive coral cover in percentage points
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of observation model for massive coral percent cover
